name: Dicey Justice
description:
Dicey Justice is a visual novel, where you play as a vigilante trying to rescue hostages from a dicey situation! Your taser is nearly out of charge, you don't know how many adversaries you'll be dealing with, or how many bullets they have left. Are you going to roll those dice?

It's a short game, but has 12 achievements tied to the different endings.

It was made for the Game Maker Tool Kit Game Jam of 2022.
